message.body: Hey, do you know when you'll ride lucky today/tomorrow? I'll come groom!
I'm going to have a lesson this afternoon around 3ish having one on Bach first, that'd be great if you want to get him ready n then we can just switch tack :) tomorrow will be at 10 am

Jane and I are planning out a lesson schedule for winter on Friday afternoons like today, What do you think about me factoring in a lesson on lucky even though we will be on a "break" from the program until spring? I think that would be a nice way for me to keep up with him and keep him jumping a little over the winter. Let me know :)
Sounds great to me, thanks for riding him! Let me know how often - every Friday?
